content: it is not often thankfully that things happen which affect everyone around the world but the current pandemic has far-reaching tentacles and i think we all are or will be impacted in some way by this for those of us who knit our craft can be an anchor during turbulent times and for me knitting in the round is my zen knitting i designed this cowl months ago before the pandemic reached where i live but i thought now would be a good time to release it i am making this pattern free in order that it can bring you some soothing knitting as well the pattern is great for solids to wildly variegated yarns you could use one color or many it is also written up for fingering weight dk weight or worsted weight and is highly adjustable to your desired style/fit as written the cowl will be about 20 in circumference and makes a relatively form-fitting cowl i hope you enjoy it and i hope it brings you some knitting zen
